approveMaximumOnPerpetual(address).details: Cannot be run in the constructor due to technical restrictions in Solidity.

approveMaximumOnPerpetual(address).notice: Sets the maximum allowance on the Perpetual contract. Must be called at least once on a given Perpetual before deposits can be made.

userdoc.notice: Base contract for proxy contracts, which can be used to provide additional functionality or restrictions when making calls to a Perpetual contract on behalf of a user.
